Header: “Serenity” set to be released this month
Content: “Serenity” an upcoming 2019 Suspense and thriller film directed and written by Steven Knight. The film stars Matthew McConaughey Anne Hathaway and Jason Clarke. From the creative mind of Oscar nominee Steven Knight comes a daringly original, stylized thriller. Baker Dill is a fishing boat captain leading tours off a tranquil, tropical enclave called Plymouth Island. His quiet life is shattered, however, when his ex-wife Karen tracks him down with a desperate plea for help. She begs Dill to save her and their young son from her new, violent husband by taking him out to sea on a fishing excursion, only to throw him to the sharks and leave him for dead. Karen’s appearance thrusts Dill back into a life he’d tried to forget, and as he struggles between right and wrong, his world is plunged into a new reality that may not be all that it seems. The film is scheduled for release 25th of this month.
